TopicTitle: ~Moon Base Alpha's Text To Speech... In KSP~

Articles.Content: Anybody up for making something like that.
I would love to see someone do that. Wouldn't it be cool to have the option to turn text into Kerbal speech? Someone get on this!
You might want to look at agises's Voiced alerts via Windows text to speech. It's a bit dated, but there may be a way to resurrect it.

Yay! Microsoft SAM is going to be back!

In case you were wondering what SAM was, it was a program for Windows XP which is now replaced by other programs.

- - - Updated - - -

Sorry, I had to make that reference.

- - - Updated - - -

I'm glad you had the Idea to do this though, and I hope it is a success.

I really like the idea.

Would make craft alerts and other stuff nice.

Man, if all the orange alerts (centered, top of screen) were processed by a voice synthetizer, it would be real nice.

JOHN MADDEN!

JOHN MADDEN! AEIOU! BRBRBRBBRBRBR UUUUU

And that is how you speak the language Aeiou.

Anyway, that would be a great idea, as long as it had some kind of device that detected ear-killers so it could kick the people off the thing, and it also had multiplayer.

But ear-killers are part of the fun!

The griefer in me is badly chained, help!

EDIT: modtdef should make some more MoonBase Alpha vids.

EDIT2: I wonder who rated this thread a 1 star?

Edited January 21, 2015 by Axelord FTW
